lower-bound: No, no más de lo usual
higher-bound: Sí, mucho más de lo usual

prompts.label-spanish: 1. Sentí que estaba en otro mundo maravilloso.
prompts.label-english: I felt that I was in a wonderful other world.

prompts.label-spanish: 2. Mis pensamientos y acciones se ralentizaron.
prompts.label-english: My thoughts and actions were slowed down.

prompts.label-spanish: 3. Las sensaciones corporales eran muy agradables.
prompts.label-english: Bodily sensations were very enjoyable.

prompts.label-spanish: 4. Escuché palabras sueltas sin saber de dónde venían.
prompts.label-english: I heard single words without knowing where they came from.

prompts.label-spanish: 5. Escuché timbres y tonos sin saber de dónde venían.
prompts.label-english: I heard rings and tones without knowing where they came from.

prompts.label-spanish: 6. Sentí como si fuerzas oscuras me hubieran superado.
prompts.label-english: I felt as if dark forces had overtaken me.

prompts.label-spanish: 7. Vi cosas que sabía que no eran reales.
prompts.label-english: I saw things I knew were not real.

prompts.label-spanish: 8. Me sentí como un títere o una marioneta.
prompts.label-english: I felt like a puppet or marionette.

prompts.label-spanish: 9. Me sentí conectado a un poder superior.
prompts.label-english: I felt connected to a higher power.

prompts.label-spanish: 10. Me sentí adormecido.
prompts.label-english: I felt sleepy.

prompts.label-spanish: 11. Se me ocurrió una melodía que tenía que repetir constantemente.
prompts.label-english: A melody occured to me that I had to constantly repeat.

prompts.label-spanish: 12. Experimenté un placer sin límites.
prompts.label-english: I experienced boundless pleasure.

prompts.label-spanish: 13. Los ruidos sin sentido sonaban como palabras o frases reales.
prompts.label-english: Meaningless noises sounded like real words or phrases.

prompts.label-spanish: 14. Vi patrones regulares con los ojos cerrados o en completa oscuridad.
prompts.label-english: I saw regular patterns with closed eyes or in complete darkness.

prompts.label-spanish: 15. Me sentí como si estuviera borracho/a
prompts.label-english: I felt drunk.

prompts.label-spanish: 16. Sentí que estaba siendo transformado/a para siempre de una manera milagrosa.
prompts.label-english: I felt I was being transformed forever in a miraculous way.

prompts.label-spanish: 17. Sentí que estaba al borde de la inconsciencia.
prompts.label-english: I felt that I was on the verge of unconsciousness.

prompts.label-spanish: 18. Todo parecía unificarse en una unidad.
prompts.label-english: Everything seemed to unify into a oneness.

prompts.label-spanish: 19. Escuché mis pensamientos como si los hubiera dicho en voz alta.
prompts.label-english: I heard my thoughts as if I had spoken them out loud.

prompts.label-spanish: 20. Los sonidos parecían influir en lo que veía.
prompts.label-english: Sounds seemed to influence what I saw.

prompts.label-spanish: 21. Me sentí atormentado/a
prompts.label-english: I felt tormented.

prompts.label-spanish: 22. Vi colores con los ojos cerrados o en completa oscuridad.
prompts.label-english: I saw colors with closed eyes or in complete darkness.

prompts.label-spanish: 23. Las formas parecían ser cambiadas por sonidos o ruidos.
prompts.label-english: Shapes seemed to be changed by sounds or noises.

prompts.label-spanish: 24. Percibía todo borroso, como a través de una especie de niebla.
prompts.label-english: I perceived everything as blurry, as if through a kind of fog.

prompts.label-spanish: 25. Una voz comentaba todo lo que pensaba aunque no había nadie.
prompts.label-english: A voice commented on everything I thought although no one was there.

prompts.label-spanish: 26. Sentí como si ya no tuviera un cuerpo.
prompts.label-english: I felt as if I no longer had a body.

prompts.label-spanish: 27. Me sentía incapaz de tomar la más mínima decisión.
prompts.label-english: I felt incapable of making even the smallest decision.

prompts.label-spanish: 28. Algunas cosas cotidianas adquirieron un significado especial.
prompts.label-english: Some everyday things acquired special meaning.

prompts.label-spanish: 29. Me sentí somnoliento.
prompts.label-english: I felt drowsy.

prompts.label-spanish: 30. Escuché oraciones completas sin saber de dónde venían.
prompts.label-english: I heard complete sentences without knowing where they came from.

prompts.label-spanish: 31. Las cosas en mi entorno tenían un nuevo y extraño significado.
prompts.label-english: Things in my environment had a new strange meaning.

prompts.label-spanish: 32. Tuve miedo de que el estado en el que me encontraba durara para siempre.
prompts.label-english: I was afraid that the state I was in would last forever.

prompts.label-spanish: 33. Vi brillos o destellos de luz con los ojos cerrados o en completa oscuridad.
prompts.label-english: I saw brightness or flashes of light with closed eyes or in complete darkness.

prompts.label-spanish: 34. Me sentí uno con mi entorno.
prompts.label-english: I felt one with my surroundings.

prompts.label-spanish: 35. Las preocupaciones y ansiedades de la vida cotidiana se sentían sin importancia.
prompts.label-english: Worries and anxieties of everyday life felt unimportant.

prompts.label-spanish: 36. Mi sentido del tiempo y del espacio estaba alterado.
prompts.label-english: My sense of time and space was altered as if I was dreaming.

prompts.label-spanish: 37. Mi percepción estaba borrosa.
prompts.label-english: My perception was blurred.

prompts.label-spanish: 38. Tuve dificultades para distinguir lo importante de lo no importante.
prompts.label-english: I had difficulties in distinguishing important from unimportant.

prompts.label-spanish: 39. Vi pasar escenas enteras con los ojos cerrados o en completa oscuridad.
prompts.label-english: I saw whole scenes roll by with closed eyes or in complete darkness.

prompts.label-spanish: 40. Sentí poderes extraordinarios dentro de mí.
prompts.label-english: I felt extraordinary powers within myself.

prompts.label-spanish: 41. Experimenté un toque de eternidad.
prompts.label-english: I experienced a touch of eternity.

prompts.label-spanish: 42. Los conflictos y las contradicciones parecían disolverse.
prompts.label-english: Conflicts and contradictions seemed to dissolve.

prompts.label-spanish: 43. Estaba asustado sin saber exactamente por qué.
prompts.label-english: I was scared without knowing exactly why.

prompts.label-spanish: 44. Experimenté todo como terriblemente distorsionado.
prompts.label-english: I experienced everything as frighteningly distorted.

prompts.label-spanish: 45. El mundo me parecía más allá del bien y del mal.
prompts.label-english: The world seemed to me beyond good and evil.

prompts.label-spanish: 46. Experimenté mi entorno como extraño y raro.
prompts.label-english: I experienced my surroundings as strange and weird.

prompts.label-spanish: 47. Me sentí como si estuviera paralizado.
prompts.label-english: I felt as if I were paralyzed.

prompts.label-spanish: 48. Escuché música sin saber de dónde venía.
prompts.label-english: I heard music without knowing where it came from.

prompts.label-spanish: 49. Escuché débilmente algo que no pude identificar.
prompts.label-english: I heard something faintly that I could not identify.

prompts.label-spanish: 50. Tuve una gran sensación de profundidad en mi.
prompts.label-english: I felt very profound.

prompts.label-spanish: 51. Sentí mi cuerpo entumecido
prompts.label-english: I felt numb.

prompts.label-spanish: 52. Experimenté el pasado, el presente y el futuro como si fuesen uno solo.
prompts.label-english: I experienced past, present, and future as a oneness.

prompts.label-spanish: 53. Experimenté un vacío insoportable.
prompts.label-english: I experienced unbearable emptiness.

prompts.label-spanish: 54. Me sentí emocionalmente involucrado con los objetos de mi entorno.
prompts.label-english: Objects in my surroundings engaged me emotionally much more than usual.

prompts.label-spanish: 55. A partir de un ruido inicialmente difuso, que no pude identificar como real, evolucionaron timbres y tonos claros.
prompts.label-english: From an initially diffuse noise, which I could not identify as real, clear rings and tones evolved.

prompts.label-spanish: 56. Me sentí bajo amenaza.
prompts.label-english: I felt threatened.

prompts.label-spanish: 57. Muchas cosas me parecieron de una belleza impresionante.
prompts.label-english: Many things appeared to me as breathtakingly beautiful.

prompts.label-spanish: 58. Me vinieron a la mente cosas que creí olvidadas hace mucho tiempo.
prompts.label-english: Things came to my mind that I thought long forgotten.

prompts.label-spanish: 59. Me sentí como lo hago poco antes de quedarme dormido.
prompts.label-english: I felt like I do shortly before falling asleep.

prompts.label-spanish: 60. Mi cuerpo se sentía entumecido, sin vida y/o extraño.
prompts.label-english: My body felt numb, lifeless, and/or alien.

prompts.label-spanish: 61. Me sentí como si estuviera medio dormido.
prompts.label-english: I felt as if I was half-asleep.

prompts.label-spanish: 62. Tuve la impresión de que estaba fuera de mi cuerpo.
prompts.label-english: I had the impression I was out of my body.

prompts.label-spanish: 63. Me sentí como si estuviera flotando.
prompts.label-english: I felt as if I was floating.

prompts.label-spanish: 64. Me sentí aislado/a de todo y de todos.
prompts.label-english: I felt isolated from everything and everyone.

prompts.label-spanish: 65. Escuché voces que no venían de los alrededores como de costumbre.
prompts.label-english: I heard voices that did not come from the surroundings as usual.

prompts.label-spanish: 66. Escuché algo como un zumbido o silbido sin reconocer la causa.
prompts.label-english: I heard something like a buzzing, swooshing, or humming without recognizing the cause.

prompts.label-spanish: 67. No pude completar un pensamiento; mis pensamientos se desconectaban repetidamente.
prompts.label-english: I was not able to complete a thought; my thoughts repeatedly became disconnected.

prompts.label-spanish: 68. Me sentí como si estuviera a punto de quedarme dormido.
prompts.label-english: I felt I was about to fall asleep.

prompts.label-spanish: 69. Tuve una revelación sobre cuestiones que antes me parecían un desafío.
prompts.label-english: I had insights into connections that had previously puzzled me.

prompts.label-spanish: 70. Muchas cosas me parecieron increíblemente divertidas.
prompts.label-english: Many things seemed incredibly funny to me.

prompts.label-spanish: 71. Los límites entre mi entorno y yo parecían desdibujarse.
prompts.label-english: The boundaries between myself and my surroundings seemed to blur.

prompts.label-spanish: 72. Podía ver imágenes de mi memoria o imaginación con extrema claridad.
prompts.label-english: I could see images from my memory or imagination with extreme clarity.

prompts.label-spanish: 73. Me sentí totalmente libre y liberado de todas las obligaciones.
prompts.label-english: I felt totally free and released from all obligations.

prompts.label-spanish: 74. Escuché ruidos difusos sin saber de dónde venían.
prompts.label-english: I heard diffuse noises without knowing where they came from.

prompts.label-spanish: 75. Los colores de las cosas parecían ser alterados por sonidos o ruidos.
prompts.label-english: The colors of things seemed to be altered by sounds or noises.

prompts.label-spanish: 76. Los sonidos y ruidos eran más débiles de lo habitual.
prompts.label-english: Sounds and noises were fainter than usual.

prompts.label-spanish: 77. Tuve pensamientos muy originales.
prompts.label-english: I had very original thoughts.

prompts.label-spanish: 78. Tuve la sensación de que ya no tenía voluntad propia.
prompts.label-english: I had the feeling that I no longer had my own will.

prompts.label-spanish: 79. Tuve miedo de perder el control sobre mí mismo.
prompts.label-english: I was afraid of losing control over myself.

prompts.label-spanish: 80. Me quedé congelado en una posición muy poco natural durante un período prolongado de tiempo.
prompts.label-english: I stayed frozen in an very unnatural position for an extended period of time.

prompts.label-spanish: 81. Experimenté una sensación de asombro
prompts.label-english: I experienced a kind of awe.

prompts.label-spanish: 82. Mi imaginación era extremadamente vívida.
prompts.label-english: My imagination was extremely vivid.

prompts.label-spanish: 83. Las cosas a mi alrededor parecían más pequeñas o más grandes.
prompts.label-english: Things in my surroundings appeared smaller or larger.

prompts.label-spanish: 84. Me sentí agotado.
prompts.label-english: I felt exhausted.

prompts.label-spanish: 85. El tiempo pasó lentamente, de una manera atormentadora.
prompts.label-english: Time passed slowly in a tormenting way.

prompts.label-spanish: 86. Experimenté una profunda paz interior.
prompts.label-english: I experienced profound inner peace.

prompts.label-spanish: 87. Todo a mi alrededor parecía estar animado y lleno de vida.
prompts.label-english: Everything around me seemed to be animated with life.

prompts.label-spanish: 88. Todo sucedió tan rápido que no pude seguirlo todo.
prompts.label-english: Everything happened so fast that I could not follow it all.

prompts.label-spanish: 89. Tenía la sensación de que algo terrible iba a pasar.
prompts.label-english: I had the feeling that something terrible was going to happen.

prompts.label-spanish: 90. Pude recordar ciertos eventos con una claridad superior.
prompts.label-english: I was able to remember certain events with exceeding clarity.

prompts.label-spanish: 91. Experimenté un amor que todo lo abarca.
prompts.label-english: I experienced an all-embracing love.

prompts.label-spanish: 92. Había sonidos en la habitación que creo que era poco probable que fueran reales.
prompts.label-english: There were sounds in the room that I feel were unlikely to have been real.

prompts.label-spanish: 93. Escuché un tictac, golpes, timbres o traqueteos sin poder reconocer la causa.
prompts.label-english: I heard a ticking, knocking, ringing, or rattling without being able to recognize the cause.

prompts.label-spanish: 94. Mi experiencia tuvo aspectos religiosos.
prompts.label-english: My experience had religious aspects to it.
